page.title: 11A day in the life of Timothy
page.content:
I wake up at half past four, get dressed and run down to have breakfast then I play with my toy farm and go outside for two hours helping my dad. I come in and have a second breakfast. I get ready for school and wait outside for Tom, when he comes we get in the car and go to pick Nicky and his sister up. We come to school and wait for the door to be opened. We go into assembly and after that we usually do Maths and English. At twelve oclock we go into the hall for dinner and then we go out to play. We do craft or topic work in the afternoon. At a quarter to four it is home time. We get in the car and go home, we get changed and have tea, go outside for an hour then watch television till bedtime.
Timothy is nine years old.
